description: Lists the Amazon Q Business indices you have created.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application connected to the index.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Q Business returns this token that you can use in the subsequent request to retrieve the next set of indexes.

nested_items.name: indices
nested_items.description: An array of information on the items in one or more indexes.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the index was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the index was last updated.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the index. When the status is ACTIVE, the index is ready.
